docket_entries.description: Chapter 13 Voluntary Petition, Schedules and Statements, Certificate of Counseling, (except for those listed below). The mailing list of creditors if not uploaded when the petition was filed, must be uploaded no later than 5 calendar days from the date of the filing of the petition. Failure to timely upload the list of creditors, may result in dismissal of the case without further notice. Electronic Filing Declaration due 07/27/2009, Schedules A-J due 07/22/2009. Statement of Financial Affairs due 07/22/2009, Attorney Disclosure Statement due 07/22/2009, Chapter 13 Plan due 07/22/2009, Debtor Statement of Current Monthly Income and Disposable Income due by 07/22/2009, Payment Advices Declaration Required by 11 USC Section 521(a)(1)(B)(iv) due by 07/22/2009, filed by JESSICA SABO of CAMPBELL & COOMBS, P.C. on behalf of WILLIAM C BAKEMEIER, LAURIE S BAKEMEIER (SABO, JESSICA) Modified on 7/9/2009 (McElroy, Cynthia). (Entered: 07/07/2009)
Meeting of Creditors scheduled for 08/19/2009 at 01:00 PM at US Trustee Meeting Room, 230 N. First Avenue, Suite 102, Phoenix, AZ (341-PHX). (SABO, JESSICA) (Entered: 07/07/2009)
Deficiency Notice to Debtor and Attorney for Debtor That All Required Documents Were Not Filed. (McElroy, Cynthia) (Entered: 07/09/2009)

Notice of Meeting of Creditors and Notice of Chapter 13 Procedures. 341(a) meeting to be held on 8/19/2009 at 01:00 PM at US Trustee Meeting Room, 230 N. First Avenue, Suite 102, Phoenix, AZ (341-PHX) Complaints under Sections 727 or 523 due by 10/19/2009. Proof of Claims due by 11/17/2009, Government Proof of Claims due by 1/4/2010, (McElroy, Cynthia) (Entered: 07/09/2009)
